seo.title: Z21 — The zero→one AI shipping community
seo.description: From AI overwhelm to operating power. Install one production workflow and 10× your weekly output—without adding hours. Product: a 6-week Cohort; Platform: the Z21 community.

hero.eyebrow: Z21 — The zero→one AI shipping community
hero.title: From AI overwhelm to operating power.
hero.sub: We take you from uncertain and overwhelmed by the AI landscape → to an AI-powered operator, 10×ing your workflow without adding hours.

vsl.headline: What it is • Why you need it • What you get • Why believe us • How to get it

whatItIs.title: What Z21 is
whatItIs.copy: Z21 is a founders' community that ships in public. The product is a 6-week Cohort that gets you live, then the community keeps you compounding.
bullets: AI tool access, templates, and a living library
Zero-to-one live demos: we build workflows on screen
Weekly Ship Rooms for feedback and accountability

whyYouNeedIt.title: Why you need it (the 2025 gap)
points: AI usage is high; ROI is uneven. Most teams stall at pilots. (Sources: McKinsey/Gartner)
Value follows workflow redesign and agentic systems—not one-off prompts.
Speed to a working, production workflow is the advantage right now.
whyYouNeedIt.note: We aim your first workflow where adoption already pays—marketing, sales, service ops, or IT.

cohort.title: The Z21 Cohort (6 weeks)
cohort.subtitle: Your time-to-value engine
outcomes: Launch a live offer page with checkout
Deploy 1 production AI workflow (e.g., lead triage, inbox co-pilot, content OS, proposal generator)
includes: Zero-to-one demo builds (n8n, GPT, content OS)

grid.title: AI tools & templates
grid.desc: Install the exact workflows we use—no fluff.

grid.title: Live demo builds
grid.desc: We build on screen so you can copy-ship.

grid.title: Accountability
grid.desc: Ship Rooms, public proof wall, and a shared scoreboard.

grid.title: Lifetime library
grid.desc: Replays and playbooks you keep after the sprint.

proof.title: Why believe us
bullets: Founder has onboarded growth, sales, product, and marketing teams into AI since early GPT.
We track boring, real metrics: assets shipped, calls booked, hours saved, workflows active @ 30/60/90 days.
Human-in-the-loop by design: you approve; we provide the leverage.
Privacy-safe defaults and simple governance patterns.

howToGetIt.title: How to get it
steps: Watch the VSL to see the mechanism.
Apply to the Z21 Cohort (limited seats).
Not sprinting? Join Z21 Founders (lifetime tools & replays).
Teams: DM "BUILD" to plan your AI onboarding.

antipitchPreempts.title: Built to answer the hard questions

items.p: Our moat is compounding proof: a results library, certification, and partner playbooks—not just another Slack.
We measure workflows still running at 30/60/90 days and re-install if needed.
Clear data-handling defaults and redaction patterns; no sensitive data required to learn the mechanism.
Facilitator bench + async library covers 70% of delivery; live time is for hot seats and shipping.

items.a: The newsletter is free. Z21 Founders is a one-time lifetime access. The Cohort is a paid, application-only sprint.

items.q: How much time do I need?
items.a: Plan on 4–6 hours per week during the 6-week Cohort. The community rhythm is flexible.

items.q: What if I'm brand new to AI?
items.a: Perfect. We start with one production workflow in a high-value area and build from there.
7-day no-questions entry refund. Do-the-work credit: complete the checklist and miss the KPIs—re-seat next cohort free.

items.q: Do I keep access after the Cohort?
items.a: Yes—lifetime access to replays and the Z21 community.

footer.smallprint: Nothing here is financial or legal advice. Results vary by implementation and market conditions.
